text: Quick question: What is the simplest way to upload a single image asset to a folder within a theme directory? I have been using the HS CLI to accomplish this in the past, but I was wondering if there was another way to go about it using just the design manager's web interface. Any tips or tricks?
Supporting uploading into the Design Manager is something we are actively working on! So CLI is your best option for now
<@U6W3H6YN8> Okay cool, good to know. Thanks for the helpful response!
